text: Sarvasrestha allahane paigambarancya sthitivara daya-drsti keli ani desatyaga karuna alelyanvara ani tyanna madata karanarya ansara lokancya sthitivarahi, jyanni asa adacanicya veli paigambaranna satha dili, tyanantara ki tyancyatalya eka gataci mane dalamalu lagali hoti. Maga allahane tyancya avasthevara daya keli. Nihsansaya, allaha tya sarvanvara atisaya meharabana ani daya karanara ahe
